quotes.quote: I know that all things are possible through Jesus Christ.
The Lord Jesus Christ is our partner, helper and advocate.
Jesus Christ never thinks about what we have been! He always thinks about what we are going to be.
Jesus Christ was an extremist for love, truth and goodness.
Jesus Christ is our spring board to promotion and prosperity.
Jesus Christ, in His infinite love, has become what we are, in order that He may make us entirely what He is.
The atonement of Jesus Christ is the supreme act of love, the supreme example of selfless concern for others.
The love of our Lord Jesus Christ towards sinners is strikingly shown in His steady purpose of heart to die for them.
The gospel of Jesus Christ is more enduring than fame, more precious than riches, more to be desired than happiness.
When Jesus Christ forgives you of sin, He never brings it back up.
Jesus Christ is in every way sufficient to the vast desires of the soul.
Jesus Christ, the condescension of divinity, and the exaltation of humanity.
In Jesus Christ, God took on a human face and became our friend and brother.
Jesus Christ is not a security from storms. He is the perfect security in storms.
Jesus Christ is, in the noblest and most perfect sense, the realized ideal of humanity.
Seeing & savoring Jesus Christ is the most important seeing and savoring you'll ever do.
Jesus Christ knows the worst about you. Nonetheless, He is the one who loves you the most.
Jesus Christ's mercy and power indwells us and gives us the strength to make a positive difference.
The life of Jesus Christ is a message of hope, a message of mercy, a message of life in a dark world.
Jesus Christ does not save the worthy, but the unworthy. Your plea must not be righteousness but guilt.
Jesus Christ is both the only price and sacrifice by which eternal redemption is obtained for believers.
Not only do we know God through Jesus Christ, we only know ourselves through Jesus Christ.
The gospel of Jesus Christ is the brightest light and the only hope for this darkened world.
In Jesus Christ we have been chosen from eternity, accepted in time, and united for eternity.
Jesus Christ had a sense of destiny.
Jesus Christ was God's revenue officer.
Jesus Christ is God's everything for man's total need.
Jesus Christ is the only God who has a date in history.
There's no greater model, in my view, than Jesus Christ.
The religion of Jesus Christ is neither new nor strange.
Jesus Christ is not just 'my personal Savior'. He is Lord.
The Lord, Jesus Christ, is our perfect example of patience.
Jesus Christ is too important to be left to the theologians.
Jesus Christ turns life right-side-up, and heaven outside-in.
Jesus Christ must be at the heart of every sermon you preach.
The only wounds that define us are the wounds of Jesus Christ.
The gospel of Jesus Christ opens the path to what we may become.
Those who truly believe on Jesus Christ are saved from all fear.
To understand Jesus Christ, you must know the Language of Heaven.
The gospel of Jesus Christ is not a religion of mourning and gloom.
Jesus Christ opened heaven's door for us by His death on the cross.
Jesus Christ is infinitely more than a great teacher and philosopher.
Jesus Christ can help us fix anything that needs fixing in our lives.
He has the power to heal and strengthen the soul. He is Jesus Christ.
The blood of Jesus Christ can cover a multitude of sins, it seems to me.
Our Lord Jesus Christ , my brethren, is our hero, a hero all the world wants.
To know Jesus Christ, you must first understand his supernatural identity. He is God.
When the Lord Jesus Christ gives a man remission of sins, He also gives him repentance.
The cross of Jesus Christ represents the intersection of God's love and God's holiness.
God, through Jesus Christ, is the victory, and the renewed earth will reflect that glory.
